<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Dialogue">Dialogue</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=25" title="Edit section: Dialogue">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="dialogue"><p><i>For previous dialogue, see <a href="/wiki/Taimi/dialogue" title="Taimi/dialogue">here</a>.</i>
</p><h3><span id="Sun.27s_Refuge"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Sun's_Refuge"><a href="/wiki/Sun%27s_Refuge" title="Sun's Refuge">Sun's Refuge</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=26" title="Edit section: Sun's Refuge">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3><dl><dd><a href="/wiki/Aurene" title="Aurene">Aurene</a> is going to be okay. Right, <a href="/wiki/Pact_Commander" title="Pact Commander">Commander</a>?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I hope so. I'm worried about her.</i>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> <i>Me too. I understand how she feels, you know? I just hope she's okay out there.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>What are you doing?</i>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> <i>Well...Aurene is under so much pressure right now. So I'm building her a safe place for when she gets scared.</i></dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> <i>She can stay here when she comes back. She'll come back...right?</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I hope so. But what about you?</i> <small><sup style="white-space:nowrap;">[<a href="/wiki/Talk:Taimi" title="Talk:Taimi"><span title="when was this added?">verification requested</span></a>]</sup></small>
<dl><dd>Me? I'm...The thing is, I don't know how much time I have left. Could be months. Could be years.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>That must be hard...</i>
<dl><dd>Yeah...But it sure makes you realize you gotta make your time count. Live with a purpose, you know? <a href="/wiki/Blish" title="Blish">Blish</a>...he knew better than anyone. I guess I want to...live up to that.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I'd say you already are.</i></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Is there anything I can do?</i> <small>(after asking what is she doing and <a href="/wiki/Good,_Better,_Nest" title="Good, Better, Nest">Good, Better, Nest</a> is locked.)</small>
<dl><dd>Well, I've written to old friendspeople Aurene has helpedall over <a href="/wiki/Elona" title="Elona">Elona</a>. They have gifts for her. But they're so far away...</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk collection option.png" src="/images/thumb/3/3b/Talk_collection_option.png/20px-Talk_collection_option.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="16" srcset="/images/thumb/3/3b/Talk_collection_option.png/30px-Talk_collection_option.png 1.5x, /images/thumb/3/3b/Talk_collection_option.png/40px-Talk_collection_option.png 2x" data-file-width="54" data-file-height="42"></span> <i>I can visit them.</i> <small><b>(unlocks <a href="/wiki/Good,_Better,_Nest" title="Good, Better, Nest">Good, Better, Nest</a>)</b></small>
<dl><dd>That's great! It'll remind Aurene of how much she's loved. When she sees everything. When she's back. You know.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I'm on it.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>That's tough.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>What do you think of the nest so far?</i> <small><b>(once the collection has been unlocked)</b></small>
<dl><dd>Leaves, branches...I don't know. There must be something else we can add. <small><b>(before acquiring any of the gifts)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I'll look.</i></dd>
<dd>It's not bad. Getting to be a place a <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragon</a> could love. Wonder what it'll look like when it's done. <small><b>(before acquiring all of the gifts)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>We'll see.</i></dd>
<dd>This feels like a proper dragon nest. Look at all the love that went into it! She has to come back now, right? <small><b>(after acquiring five of the gifts)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I hope so. I miss her too.</i></dd>
<dd>Look at all this! I've never lived anywhere this nice. Or this full of love. No dragon could say no to this. Am I right? <small><b>(after acquiring all of the gifts)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You're right.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>She'll be fine.</i></dd></dl><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Eye_of_the_North"><a href="/wiki/Eye_of_the_North" title="Eye of the North">Eye of the North</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=27" title="Edit section: Eye of the North">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3><dl><dt>Upon first visit</dt>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> Oh, hey. Don't mind us, Commander. Just setting up a lab for important <a href="/wiki/Elder_Dragon" title="Elder Dragon">Elder Dragon</a> research. Fate of the <a href="/wiki/Tyria_(world)" title="Tyria (world)">whole world</a> depends on it. No big deal.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Sure thing.</i>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> Is this really the best location?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>(shrug)</i>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> If we're investigating the <a href="/wiki/Dragonrise" class="mw-redirect" title="Dragonrise">dragon cycle</a>, we should be near a DRAGON, right? There aren't too many Elder Dragons left in the world, so Aurene's our only bet.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Agreed.</i>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> (sigh) I guess you're right. But we could have a more robust laboratory at <a href="/wiki/Rata_Sum" title="Rata Sum">Rata Sum</a>.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Anything I can do to help?</i>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> We can always use more data to isolate commonalities among the Elder Dragons. Find a pattern. You've fought them for years, Commander. Inside your memories could be clues to the dragon cycle.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>My memories?</i>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> Ooh, do we get to poke around in the commander's head?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Leave my head alone.</i>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> I was thinking we use the <a href="/wiki/Scrying_Pool" title="Scrying Pool">scrying pool</a> to help the commander relive the memories of these past years.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Hmm...</i>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> That's ingenious, Gorrik.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>She's not wrong.</i>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> Oh. Well. Thank you.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Time to relive some old memories, I guess.</i></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I have to go.</i></dd></dl><dl><dt>Subsequent interaction</dt>
<dd>How do you like my new lab? I mean ours. It's OUR lab. It's a little cozier than <a href="/wiki/Rata_Novus_(instance)" title="Rata Novus (instance)">Rata Novus</a>, but the <a href="/wiki/Krewe" title="Krewe">krewe</a> is much friendlier. Heh.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk quest option tango.png" src="/images/5/5a/Talk_quest_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Just relived the marionette incident...</i> <small>(Only during <a href="/wiki/Wrath_of_the_Twisted_Marionette_(bonus_event)" title="Wrath of the Twisted Marionette (bonus event)">Wrath of the Twisted Marionette</a>)</small>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> I can't believe I ever looked up to Scarlet. You can be a supergenius without being a deranged terroristHELLO!</dd>
<dd><b>Gorrik:</b> Good thing you were all there to stop her. I was studying the fascinating Elonian sand moth back then.</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> Oh, yeah. I forgot you had that whole uh...bug phase.</dd>
<dd><b>Gorrik:</b> It's not a phase! Entomology is a legitimate and important field of research.</dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Can you give me an update on the dragon fallout?</i>
<dl><dd>If it's <a href="/wiki/Dragon_energy" title="Dragon energy">dragon magic</a> you want to talk about, I'm your specialist. What's up?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Any update on the flow of <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Dragonstorm" title="Dragonstorm">dragons' deaths?</a></i>
<dl><dd>That's the question of the hour. Nothing to report yet, though. Sorry. We have to assume...you know... But nothing's for sure yet.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You know what they say about assuming, right?</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>We're low on dragons. Can Aurene handle the flow of magic alone?</i>
<dl><dd>The <a href="/wiki/Exalted" title="Exalted">Exalted</a> believed <a href="/wiki/Glint" title="Glint">Glint</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Scion" title="Scion">scions</a>pluralwould shoulder the <a href="/wiki/The_All" title="The All">burden</a>, but we only have Aurene now. But we're still here. Either she can handle it, or <a href="/wiki/Deep_sea_dragon" class="mw-redirect" title="Deep sea dragon">something else</a> is out there. Or time is limited.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I hope that's a good sign.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Actually, maybe my question is for Gorrik.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Nice lab. Planning to expand?</i>
<dl><dd>We'd take up the whole place if we could...but we can't just commandeer the place, can we? We'll bring in whatever we need to solve this. World hanging in the balance and all.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I know it's important, but take care of yourself, too.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You've got quite the setup here.</i></dd></dl><dl><dt>Updated with <a href="/wiki/Return_to_A_Star_to_Guide_Us" title="Return to A Star to Guide Us">Return to A Star to Guide Us</a> patch <sup style="white-space:nowrap;">[<a href="/wiki/Talk:Taimi" title="Talk:Taimi"><span title="See if the above dialogue is still available in the same form, if it is updated via progressing in Return events, or if it has been changed even for players running the Return events for the first time.">verification requested</span></a>]</sup></dt>
<dd>The lab's all online, and we're churning through the dragon-magic recordings. Busy busy.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk quest option tango.png" src="/images/5/5a/Talk_quest_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Just relived the marionette incident...</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Can you give me an update on the dragon fallout?</i>
<dl><dd>If it's dragon magic you want to talk about, I'm your specialist. What's up?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Been thinking about another Elder Dragon. The remaining one.</i>
<dl><dd>Understandable. Its existence has been the leading hypothesis in my models, but how have we not seen more of it by now? <a href="/wiki/Zhaitan" title="Zhaitan">Zhaitan</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Victory_or_Death" title="Victory or Death">death</a>, <a href="/wiki/Kralkatorrik" title="Kralkatorrik">Kralkatorrik</a>'s... Why isn't it active?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>I think it's only a matter of time.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Any update on the flow of magic from the dragons' deaths?</i>
<dl><dd>To summarize, a large portion of the released magic was pulled away before Aurene could capture it. Where it exactly went is currently unknown, but it's constantly on my mind.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Unsettling that we don't know. Keep searching.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>We're low on dragons. Can Aurene handle the flow of magic alone?</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Actually, maybe my question is for Gorrik.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Nice lab. Planning to expand?</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You've got quite the setup here.</i></dd></dl><dl><dt>Updated with <a href="/wiki/Return_to_Champions" title="Return to Champions">Return to Champions</a> patch</dt>
<dd>You've relived it all, huh? I hope that's giving you a fresh perspective. We're starting to draw some conclusions over here, but it'll still be a while before the end. I mean, before we're done.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk quest option tango.png" src="/images/5/5a/Talk_quest_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Just relived the marionette incident...</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Can you give me an update on the dragon fallout?</i>
<dl><dd>If it's dragon magic you want to talk about, I'm your specialist. What's up?</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Been thinking about another Elder Dragon. The remaining one.</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Any update on the flow of magic from the dragons' deaths?</i>
<dl><dd>Directionally, it went south. The distance is unexpectedly far, so it'll take longer to triangulate. But we're getting closer to knowing.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Keep up the good work.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>We're low on dragons. Can Aurene handle the flow of magic alone?</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Actually, maybe my question is for Gorrik.</i></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk more option tango.png" src="/images/4/47/Talk_more_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>Nice lab. Planning to expand?</i> <small><b>(Same as above.)</b></small></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You've got quite the setup here.</i></dd></dl><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Historical_dialogue">Historical dialogue</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=28" title="Edit section: Historical dialogue">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3><dl><dt>In Eye of the North during <a href="/wiki/Dragon_Bash" title="Dragon Bash">Dragon Bash</a></dt>
<dd>How do you like my new lab? I mean ours. It's OUR lab. It's a little cozier than Rata Novus, but the krewe is much friendlier. Heh.</dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk quest option tango.png" src="/images/5/5a/Talk_quest_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You two going to check out Dragon Bash?</i>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> I don't know. Doesn't really feel like my scene.</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> We could use a break from staring at charts and papers, though. Think I could chug a whole stein of norn grog?</dd>
<dd><b>Gorrik:</b> Their body mass is much greater. I think you'd die from liver failure.</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> Me? Ha!</dd>
<dd><b>Gorrik:</b> It does feel a bit...weird to be celebrating the bashing of dragons. Figurative or otherwise.</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> Primordus threatened the asura for ages, and Jormag wreaked havoc on the norn.</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> I don't agree with it, but yeah I understand why the festival exists.</dd></dl></dd>
<dd><span class="inline-icon"><img alt="Talk end option tango.png" src="/images/f/f5/Talk_end_option_tango.png" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" data-file-width="18" data-file-height="18"></span> <i>You've got quite the setup here.</i></dd></dl></div>









<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Quotes">Quotes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=29" title="Edit section: Quotes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<dl><dt>Greets</dt>
<dd><i>Got candy?</i></dd>
<dd><i>I'm behaving.</i></dd>
<dd><i>Hm. What?</i></dd>
<dd><i>Hello, hello, hello.</i></dd>
<dd><i>Oh, hi.</i></dd>
<dd><i>It wasn't me.</i></dd>
<dd><i>Look at me. I'm taller than you.</i> <small>(When inside <a href="/wiki/Scruffy" title="Scruffy">Scruffy</a>)</small></dd>
<dd><i>Greetings, organic creature. Just kidding, it's me in here.</i> <small>(When inside Scruffy)</small></dd>
<dd><i>I'm bored. Let's do something.</i> <small>(When inside Scruffy)</small></dd>
<dd><i>Built this thing myself. Check it outclassic vintage parts.</i> <small>(When inside Scruffy)</small></dd>
<dd><i>Ever combine limbic crystals and arcane reducers? I have!</i> <small>(When inside Scruffy)</small></dd></dl>

<dd><i>Woooo! Let's rumble.</i> <small>(When inside Scruffy)</small></dd></dl>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">Notes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=32" title="Edit section: Notes">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li>Taimi was introduced with the <a href="/wiki/Game_updates/2014-01-21" title="Game updates/2014-01-21">January 21, 2014 game update</a>.</li>
<li>Whenever the <a href="/wiki/Player" title="Player">player</a> brings up a dialogue window with Taimi during <a href="/wiki/Living_World_Season_2" title="Living World Season 2">Living World Season 2</a> while she is riding on or inside <a href="/wiki/Scruffy" title="Scruffy">Scruffy</a>, the window shows artwork instead of the usual in-game portrait. This is due to how the dialogue window takes a snapshot of the model's head for the portrait, which in this case would be Scruffy's head rather than Taimi's due to them being one <a href="/wiki/Non-player_character" title="Non-player character">NPC</a> model.
<ul><li>Dialogue windows with Taimi while she is in <a href="/wiki/Scruffy_2.0" title="Scruffy 2.0">Scruffy 2.0</a> do not present artwork, but instead display Scruffy 2.0's model.</li></ul></li>
<li>The identities of Taimi's parents have remained unknown to this day although exploring them in the future is a possiblity.<sup id="cite_ref-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-10">[10]</a></sup></li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Trivia">Trivia</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=33" title="Edit section: Trivia">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li>Taimi is <a href="/wiki/Voice_actor" title="Voice actor">voiced</a> by <a href="/wiki/Debi_Derryberry" title="Debi Derryberry">Debi Derryberry</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-11">[11]</a></sup></li>
<li>Taimi has her own leitmotif, called "<a href="/wiki/Taimi%27s_Theme" title="Taimi's Theme">Taimi's Theme</a>", which was composed by <a href="/wiki/Maclaine_Diemer" title="Maclaine Diemer">Maclaine Diemer</a>.</li>
<li>Taimi currently wears <a href="/wiki/Taimi%27s_Outfit" title="Taimi's Outfit">Taimi's Outfit</a> without a helmet, though she wore the helmet during <a href="/wiki/Living_World_Season_3" title="Living World Season 3">Living World Season 3</a>. Before Living World Season 3, she wore an <a href="/wiki/Exalted_Mantle_(skin)" title="Exalted Mantle (skin)">Exalted Mantle</a>, a unique chest skin, unique gloves, <a href="/wiki/Feathered_Pants_(skin)" title="Feathered Pants (skin)">Feathered Pants</a> and <a href="/wiki/Masquerade_Boots_(skin)" title="Masquerade Boots (skin)">Masquerade Boots</a>.
<ul><li>The unique armor worn by Taimi is part of the unimplemented <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.artstation.com/artwork/4x8y8">Cold Noble armor set</a>.</li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Braham_Eirsson" class="mw-redirect" title="Braham Eirsson">Braham Eirsson</a> initially thought that Taimi's name was Tiny.<sup id="cite_ref-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-12">[12]</a></sup></li>
<li>Taimi was named by <a href="/wiki/Angel_Leigh_McCoy" title="Angel Leigh McCoy">Angel Leigh McCoy</a> after a 95-year-old Finnish woman she had befriended who died during Taimi's development.</li>
<li><i><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://translate.google.com/#fi/en/taimi">Taimi</a></i> means 'seedling' or 'sapling' in <a href="//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finnish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Finnish language">Finnish</a>.</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Mia_Kim" title="Mia Kim">Mia Kim</a> designed Taimi's hair and face.</li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Taimi&action=edit&section=35" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="mw-references-wrap mw-references-columns"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-BtS-1">^ <a href="#cite_ref-BtS_1-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-BtS_1-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-BtS_1-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yQeeIwwYt04">Guild Wars 2 - Developer Behind the Scenes: All about Taimi</a>, YouTube.com</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-2"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Taimi%27s_Game" title="Taimi's Game">Taimi's Game</a> in 1329
<dl><dd><b><Character name>:</b> Only sixteen years old and you're puppet-mastering one of your superiors...</dd>
<dd><b><Character name>:</b> Admirable and a little unsettling, Taimi.</dd></dl>
</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-TaimiDisease-3">^ <a href="#cite_ref-TaimiDisease_3-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-TaimiDisease_3-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Edge_of_the_Mists_(living_world)" title="Edge of the Mists (living world)">Edge of the Mists</a>
<dl><dd><b>Taimi:</b> I was born this way. My legs were never strong enough to carry me very far. Don't pity me, though. I hate pity. And I don't need it because I do just fine for myself.</dd>
<dd><b><Character name>:</b> I can see that. Can your legs be cured?</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> That remains to be seen. The degenerative effects of my condition may spread to other parts of my body as I get older, but for now it's just the legs.</dd></dl>
</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-4"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Edge_of_the_Mists_(living_world)" title="Edge of the Mists (living world)">Edge of the Mists</a>
<dl><dd><b><Character name>:</b> So you're an orphan?</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b> That's right. I've been a ward of the Rata Sum social-agency divisionProgeny Protective Servicessince I was a baby. But neither that nor my legs ever slowed me down much.</dd></dl>
</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-5"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Notes_from_Rata_Novus" title="Notes from Rata Novus">Notes from Rata Novus</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-contactpoints-6">^ <a href="#cite_ref-contactpoints_6-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-contactpoints_6-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Contact_Point" title="Contact Point">Contact Point</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-7"><b><a href="#cite_ref-7">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Coming_Home" title="Coming Home">Coming Home</a>
<dl><dd><b>Gorrik:</b> Taimi's working on her treatise. "The Elder Dragons Reconsidered." She insisted I should go...live a little.</dd>
<dd><b>Gorrik:</b> To be clear: I'm attending only for the chance to study the local fauna. I will not be participating in any revelry.</dd></dl>
</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-8"><b><a href="#cite_ref-8">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Current_Events" title="Current Events">Current Events</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-9"><b><a href="#cite_ref-9">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Taimi#Dialogue" title="Taimi">Taimi#Dialogue</a>
<dl><dd><b><Character name>:</b>We're low on dragons. Can Aurene handle the flow of magic alone?</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi:</b>The Exalted believed Glint's scionspluralwould shoulder the burden, but we only have Aurene now. But we're still here. Either she can handle it, or something else is out there. Or time is limited.</dd></dl>
</span></li>
<li id="cite_note-10"><b><a href="#cite_ref-10">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://forum-en.gw2archive.eu/forum/game/gw2/Dolyak-Express-Feb-10-2014/page/2#post3670792">Post by Mark Katzbach quoting Bobby Stein</a> in "Dolyak Express Feb 10, 2014", Old Guild Wars 2 Forums (Archived)</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-11"><b><a href="#cite_ref-11">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://forum-en.gw2archive.eu/forum/archive/madness/Taimi-s-Voice/first#post3529692">Post by Scott McGough</a> in "Taimi's Voice...", Old Guild Wars 2 Forums (Archived)</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-12"><b><a href="#cite_ref-12">^</a></b> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Edge_of_the_Mists_(living_world)" title="Edge of the Mists (living world)">Edge of the Mists</a>
<dl><dd><b>Braham Eirsson</b>: What's your story anyway, Tiny? How does a little thing like you get into such big trouble?</dd>
<dd><b>Taimi</b>: It's Taimi. And I'm a progeny prodigy. I've got important people fighting for the right to be my teacher.</dd></dl>
</span></li>
</ol></div>
